definition: on a large scale without careful discrimination, ignoring distinctions, the selling of goods to merchants, sell in large quantities
details:
adverb
- on a large scale without careful discrimination
= example: on a large scale without careful discrimination
= synonyms: in large quantities
- at a wholesale price
= example: at a wholesale price
adjective
- ignoring distinctions
= synonyms: sweeping
noun
- the selling of goods to merchants
verb
- sell in large quantities
